arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى اللَّهِ بِإِذْنِهِ وَسِرَاجًا مُنِيرًا
english: And as one who invites to Allah [Islamic Monotheism, i.e. to worship none but Allah (Alone)] by His Leave, and as a lamp spreading light (through your instructions from the Quran and the Sunnah the legal ways of the Prophet SAW).
bengali: এবং আল্লাহর আদেশক্রমে তাঁর দিকে আহবায়করূপে এবং উজ্জ্বল প্রদীপরূপে।
